assert check_parser("'\\N{LATIN SMALL LETTER B}'", 'b')
if sys.version_info >= (3, 3):
    assert check_parser("'\\N{LATIN CAPITAL LETTER GHA}'", 'Ƣ')
with pytest.raises(arpeggio.GrammarError):
    check_parser("'\\N{NOT A VALID NAME}'", '\\N{NOT A VALID NAME}')
assert check_parser("'\\N{should not match filter regex!}'",
    '\\N{should not match filter regex!}')
